title: Spiga City
author: Spiga City
content: ðŸŸ¢ AirDrop: SPIGA CITY ðŸ”¥ REWARD 400 SPI ($20) + 100 SPI for each referral ($5) ðŸ¤©ðŸ”¥Spiga City â€“ an upcoming NFT game (P2E), a virtual city made of skyscrapers, in which retail space in the form of NFTs will be sold, which it will be possible to: sell, rent, create your own business on them and for this all receive an SPI game token.Join our Telegram Announcement ChannelFollow us on Twitter and Like&Retweet this Tweet and @Tag 3 FriendsGo to the site spiga.city - connect Metamask, enter the name twitter, telegramClick ClaimDONEAirDrop information:â€“ allocated 0.1% tokens (1 000 000 SPI ) ~ 1700 participantsâ€“ participant can only produce 1 Claim tokens worth 400 SPI (20$ at the Public Sale price ($0.05))â€“ 100 SPI will be sent to your Metamask wallet immediatelyâ€“ 300 SPI will be credited to the account balance. Unlock balance after TGE: Cliff: - 6 months, Vesting: - 12 monthsâ€“ 100 SPI per referral is additionally credited to the balance of each participant (ref code is displayed after Claim tokens on the site)â€“ mandatory subscription to Twitter and Telegram, accounts will be verified before unlockingTotal supply: 1 000 000 000 SPIBlockchain: Binance Smart Chain (BSC)Address: 0x0F1c9Be2f66aEfe54C3A73da4f082d9Ed18AAB5CSite | Twitter |  Telegram | Instagram
